name: Deeper and Deeper Mining Operations ltd.
name_original: Deeper and Deeper Mining Operations ltd.
description:
In this game, you will become a drill, that can break through nearly any type of rock to get the most precious treasures of the depths.

The most important thing is to keep track of fuel and don't get caught in lava then the depth will reward you with diamonds and gold.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 48

Controls:

WASD or Left/Right keys

Credits:

Voxel-exploration game by @saviorium and @Sasha9889

Libraries used:

  • LÖVE 11.3
  • hump, peachy, baton
  • Font: m3x6
  • Sounds from freesound.org
